thread.title: BRIEF-Banca Generali Board Approves Agreements For Digital Partnership With Saxo Bank

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Banca Generali Board Approves Agreements For Digital Partnership With Saxo Bank

organizations.name: generali board approves agreements for digital partnership with saxo bank

text:
March 9 (Reuters) - BANCA GENERALI:
* BOARD APPROVES DEFINITIVE AGREEMENTS WITH SAXO BANK FOR PARTNERSHIP ON ONLINE TRADING AND DIGITAL SERVICES
* AGREEMENT ENVISAGES THE ESTABLISHMENT OF A NEW ENTITY, BG SAXO SIM
* BG SAXO SIM IS EXPECTED TO START OPERATING IN THE SECOND HALF OF THE YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
